name: Gorg Story
description:
Controls: 

Mouse - Look Around

Left Click- Jump

ESC - Leave Game 

================================================== 

Background: 

Enter, Gorg the Goblin. You're a typical, average, every day, goblin who works at the local Lord's coal mine. It’s an awful job, and it pays even worse, but you know, at least it pays. Doesn’t make things any easier when there’s a cave in, and the mine collapses. Nothing seems to go really well for Gorg, but only being a head and legs means he’s got some killer leg muscles. To get out of this cave you need to jump and strafe your way through the collapsed mine to freedom.  Embark on a thrilling adventure as you guide Gorg through the rubble, navigating obstacles and outsmarting danger at every turn. Jump and strafe your way through the treacherous underground world, using Gorg's unique abilities to escape to the surface. With fast-paced and challenging gameplay, stunning graphics, and a captivating storyline, "Gorg the Goblin" is a game you won't want to miss. Will you have what it takes to guide Gorg to freedom and uncover the truth behind the mine collapse? Play now to find out.

Credits

Frazier Kyle, Justin Klein, and Andrew Jackson - Level Design

Jackson Clayton and Bennett Meacham - Programming

Dylan Fall and Adam Scranton - Sound

Lindsay Smith - Art

Will Shuppert - Trampoline

Casey Cross and Alex Myron - Ideas

MGDC Game Jam Spring 2023 Submission
